title: Taxi! (with Peter Gibson MP)
itunes:title: Taxi! (with Peter Gibson MP)
description:
Conservative MP for Darlington, Peter Gibson, says there is palpable anger over Downing Street parties. But, he tells Bloomberg Westminster's Caroline Hepker and Yuan Potts, Boris Johnson has been a pivotal figure in the party's success. Plus, why he wants reform of the taxi licensing rules.

And the CEO of Ipsos MORI U.K. & Ireland, Kelly Beaver, joins with the latest polling. She says seven in 10 people are dissatisfied with how the PM is doing his job.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Conservative MP for Darlington, Peter Gibson, says there is palpable anger over Downing Street parties. But, he tells Bloomberg Westminster's Caroline Hepker and Yuan Potts, Boris Johnson has been a pivotal figure in the party's success. Plus, why he wants reform of the taxi licensing rules.

And the CEO of Ipsos MORI U.K. & Ireland, Kelly Beaver, joins with the latest polling. She says seven in 10 people are dissatisfied with how the PM is doing his job.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
itunes:author: Bloomberg
